interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Medical Assistance " , or " Almost Burning " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " The Value of Sharing " .

progression.synopsis: Sensei wakes up to find Miku sitting on him, dressed as a succubus/demon/bat (she isn't quite sure). She was considered the least likely person to do anything weird while waking Sensei, but finds it difficult to ignore his reaction to where she's sitting. Makoto enters, and doesn't believe Miku's protests that nothing was actually going on. Makoto then makes Sensei help prepare for the Halloween party, which takes most of the day.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.10p1.
